mapper.select: /* IndexDAO.selectFileVolume */ SELECT NVL(CEIL(SUM(FILE_MG)/100000),0) FILE_MG, NVL(CEIL(SUM(DECODE(USE_AT, 'Y', FILE_MG))/100000), 0) FILE_MG_Y, NVL(CEIL(SUM(DECODE(USE_AT, 'N', FILE_MG))/100000), 0) FILE_MG_N, 1000-NVL(CEIL(SUM(FILE_MG)/100000),0) REMAIN FROM TCM_ATCHMNFL_DETAIL WHERE LAST_UPDUSR_SN = #{emplyrSn}
/* IndexDAO.selectFileSn */ SELECT TO_NUMBER(NVL(MAX(ATCHMNFL_SN), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00000')) + 1 FILE_SN FROM TCM_ATCHMNFL

/* IndexDAO.selectFileList */ SELECT tad.FILE_STRE_COURS_NM , tad.ORGINL_FILE_NM , tad.FILE_NM , tad.FILE_EXTSN_NM , tad.FILE_MG , tad.DOWN_CO , tad.FRST_REGIST_DT , tad.FRST_REGISTER_SN , tad.ATCHMNFL_SN , tad.FILE_SN , DECODE(TEB.FILE_SN, '', 'N', 'Y') BKMK_AT FROM TCM_ATCHMNFL ta , TCM_ATCHMNFL_DETAIL tad , TCM_EMPLYRBY_BKMK TEB WHERE TA.ATCHMNFL_SN = TAD.ATCHMNFL_SN AND TAD.ATCHMNFL_SN = TEB.ATCHMNFL_SN(+) AND TAD.FILE_SN = TEB.FILE_SN(+) AND TA.USE_AT = #{useAt} AND TA.FRST_REGISTER_SN = #{emplyrSn}
/* IndexDAO.selectFileDtlData */ SELECT FILE_NM , FILE_STRE_COURS_NM , FILE_EXTSN_NM , FILE_MG , DOWN_CO FROM TCM_ATCHMNFL_DETAIL TAD WHERE ATCHMNFL_SN = #{AtchfileSn} AND FILE_SN = #{fileSn}
mapper.insert: /* IndexDAO.insertBmFavorite */ INSERT INTO TCM_EMPLYRBY_BKMK ( EMPLYR_SN, ATCHMNFL_SN, FILE_SN, FRST_REGISTER_SN, FRST_REGIST_DT, LAST_UPDUSR_SN, LAST_UPDT_DT ) VALUES ( #{sEmplyrSn}, #{atchmnflSn}, #{fileSn}, #{sEmplyrSn}, SYSDATE, #{sEmplyrSn}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: /* IndexDAO.selectBkmkList */ SELECT TAD.ATCHMNFL_SN , TAD.FILE_SN , TAD.FILE_STRE_COURS_NM , TAD.ORGINL_FILE_NM , TAD.FILE_MG , TAD.FILE_EXTSN_NM , TAD.FILE_NM FROM TCM_ATCHMNFL_DETAIL TAD , TCM_EMPLYRBY_BKMK TEB WHERE TAD.ATCHMNFL_SN = TEB.ATCHMNFL_SN AND TAD.FILE_SN = TEB.FILE_SN AND TEB.EMPLYR_SN = #{sEmplyrSn}
